item.title: Ukrainian Vareniki
item.description: (Vareniki/Dumplings) Vareniki are popular all over the world, but abroad they have different names. ⏲️ Prep: 30 mins 🍳 Cook time: 25 mins 🍽️ Servings: 45 Ingredients 18 ounces potatoes 3 cups all-purpose flour ¼ cup sour cream ½ teaspoon baking soda ½ cup water ¼ cup butter 2 onions, finely diced 3 ½ cups finely chopped button mushrooms Directions Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil.
